name: MeaslesTestsForMeaslesVirusIgMAntibody
title: Measles (Tests for measles virus IgM Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Measles virus IgM antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Measles IgM Ab;  

LOINC search: 'Measles virus IgM Ab -rubella -panel -interpretation'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel and interpretation tests)
